value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|A time to express our love and
gratitude for the people we care
about... What a wonderful festival!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|It's so early...how are you in such
high spirits?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|I'm just so inspired by this festival. I
wonder how I can communicate all
these overwhelming feelings...$k$pEspecially my love for my father... I
need more than flowers, something
even more special...but what?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|I would think that Chrom would be
perfectly happy if you just expressed
your feelings. No need to stress...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|Oh, I know! What if I made a special
outfit for him?$k$pI could design something that would
fit him perfectly. Something just for
the festival. He'd like that, right?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|Ah, well... Yes, I think it's a nice idea,
but the festival is today. I don't think
you'd be able to make it in time.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|Oh. You're right. Hmm. That's too
bad. I really liked that idea. OK, what
if, instead...there must be...hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|Why don't we ask what others are
doing? I'm sure we can gather some
great ideas.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Valentine22,Face|Yes! I'll go see what others are doing
for the festival. I'm sure to find
something!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|...and that's why I'm asking around!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|Hmm...something that would make
Chrom happy. Oh! What about an
unbreakable training dummy?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|A d-dummy? I don't know... That
might be kind of difficult to wrap...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|A gift, you say? Leave this to me!$k$pThere is no better gift than
unleashing a weapon's true
power with a fitting name.$k$pI will channel the first god in naming.
Infinite possibilities can be unlocked
within a divine weapon...$k$pAnd that name is! Hmm... Yes, let
me see... Ferocious Fate! No...
Devoted Deus Destiny... No...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|Hmm... I wonder how long this
will take...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|Sorry we couldn't be of more help.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Valentine22,Face|Oh, not at all. I appreciate you trying.
Well, I suppose we should keep
asking around...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|If the present is from the two of you,
we could try... Double... Duo... Oh,
and then there's...$k$p$Sbs150|
